title: Gold Steadies as Investors Bank on More US Rate Cuts Next Year
description: Gold steadied after three days of gains, supported by the prospect of further monetary easing in the US following a rate cut this week. Silver traded near a record high.
content: Gold steadied after three days of gains, supported by the prospect of further monetary easing in the US following a rate cut this week. Silver traded near a record high.
